oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: When people are ill, some of the people 'doctor' the afflicted person and stand and make various gestures. Other people sing (and do not make gestures). Other people beat the drum. Dreams put 'a thing' into a person and makes them unwell. 1) See also Dreams, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Curing illness (and the trance dance)
